name: DeathPath
description:
The path to a new fate, wandering between life and death, the balance with immortality must be faced insightfully. Make your own path on your way, dealing with realities and their variants.

  • You can climb walls while holding on to them... but what if walls aren't enough?
  • Become one with the surfaces to increase your power.
  • It is said ghosts can possess walls and even ceilings!
  • Reach every gate to complete your journey.

Controls:

[W,A,S,D] or [Arrows] - Move

[SPACE] - Jump

Hold [LEFT SHIFT] - Grab from wall & more

[R] - Restart Level

[ESC] or [P] - Pause Menu

Click with Mouse - GUI

Created by Zak and Gigi. Blackout Studios.

Some assets were made from scratch and other third-party assets were partially used under a free license.

Pixel-art:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/medieval-pixel-art-asset-f...

Audio:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/free-2d-mega-pack-177430

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/endless-cave-ambience-54032

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/rpg-bgm-dungeon-37116

This was our first Game Jam and also our first game ever, feel free to share your opinions and recommendations in the comments section below, we’ll love to read them. Thanks for playing!
